section.marginalnote: Discharge of curator on termination of office
section.sectiontext: If the person ceases to be a missing person, or on the grant of probate of the will or of letters of administration of the estate of the missing person, the Supreme Court, on application to it, and on the accounts of the curator being passed in accordance with the provisions for the passing of accounts of trustees under the Trustee Act and rules under it, may discharge the curator appointed under this Act in respect of the property of the person.
